item.title: InterContinental Hotels & Resorts presents an art installation in Singapore to commemorate its 200 properties worldwide
item.description: Video of Hall with the bottles shaping the number ‘200’. To mark the opening of their 200th hotel, InterContinental Hotels & Resorts commissioned contemporary British artist Alexander Hall, known professionally as Haut de Gamme, to create a commemorative installation. The artwork features 200 champagne bottles, each hand-painted by Hall in his signature drip technique. Inspired by the unique character of each InterContinental property, the individually designed bottles collectively form the number “200”.
